subject: Golf
Scottish Open (Golf)
John Deere Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Ernie Els and Phil Mickelson endured frustrating second rounds in Inverness and were upstaged by lesser-known players, like the leader at 12 under, Chris Doak.
snippet: Ernie Els and Phil Mickelson endured frustrating second rounds in Inverness and were upstaged by lesser-known players, like the leader at 12 under, Chris Doak.
